column1: This disorder can affect both men and women.
A person with OCPD has symptoms of perfectionism that usually begin by early adulthood.
Talk therapy is thought to be the most effective treatment for OCPD.
In some cases, medicines combined with talk therapy is more effective than either treatment alone.
The rigidness and control of OCPD may prevent many of the complications, such as drug abuse, which are common in other personality disorders.
